comments.title: Why buy eco device
comments.description: I am using pureit  eco device I share my personal opinion first all person chose some kind of ro filter try to check ur current borwel water tds level (total disolved solid) normal ro device like ro+uv any brand suitable tds range is below (2000 tds) range device waste water ratio 1:3  water after purify stage  level 35 to 150 tds its normal ro device working like that.some people said that I don't want taste drink water I want only rich Mineral water that person only buy this type eco device otherwise don't buy it try to normal ro+uv model any brand u want.eco device input borwel water tds level below 2000tds that output purifier water become 150 to 250 tds level this range not tasty water and output waste water ratio1:2 but good Mineral in the water who recommended range 50 to 150 very good drinking 150 to 250 good quality of water rich Mineral so now I tell u if u want only taste in water don't buy eco model device try normal ro+uv.

comments.title: Pathetic service from HUL Pureit
comments.description: I was advised by the salesman at the local shop not to go with PureIt as the service and support is very poor. I deeply regret my decision to ignore his advice. Till I bought the product these people were in a hurry to show me product demo. After buying though I have raised online request and followed up 6 times over 3 days with no use. Everytime they assure me they will try get it done the same day. But the end result has been the same - no one calls/comes to install the water purifier. Would never recommend HUL Pureit to anyone.

comments.title: Good
comments.description: water tastes good than other purifiers

comments.title: Don't go by negative views
comments.description: This is an extremely good product. I received it on 6th of May and I called up Pureit and asked them to install on 8th May, Sunday as nobody is available during week days. I also told them that water is available only between 10 am to 12 am so they will have to send their technician between that time. They noted my requirements and informed me that the technician will be calling me before coming. I received a call from the technician on the same day and he confirmed that he will be coming on 8th May by 10-10:30 am. He came during the specified time, installed and checked the machine. He explained me the functionality also. But later, I found that there is a drop-by-drop leakage from the bottom. I again called the company and booked my complaint with the same Sunday conditions. The technician came on 15th May at 10 am and did the necessary and the leakage stopped. Later he told me that he is an engineer. He also told me that their plumber was on leave on the day of installation, so he came himself. Such a dedication that an engineer is coming himself for the installation. I haven't seen this anywhere. The company that is doing Pureit installations in Pune is Iqra Enterprises and the name of engineer who came is Yogesh Sakpal. Hats off to both. I have given 4 ratings currently just because it is new. Let me use it for a month or two, then I will come and edit my rating. But please don't go by negative reviews.

comments.title: Beware of maintenance!!!!

comments.title: DO NOT BUY
comments.description: After 6 months got an error and after two days it stopped working, asked in customer care said your machine need filters change which will cost 5000/-, i bought this in 14000/- , now I have to buy it's filter in just six months for 5000/- ,does it make any sense???

comments.title: Received a used product
comments.description: I received a used product twice from Amazon, shame on Amazon for not having a quality control in place. If someone like me staying in the urban city like south Bombay has to face something like this than I wonder what people staying in the remote areas has to go through….

comments.title: (Health Hazard) High maintenance, Poor customer service and Bad water Quality
comments.description: I am not able to get rid of my Bisleri 20 L can. In a nutshell this is a health hazard to your family. It doesn't do much on purification. TDS is almost same as tap water. The service people do visit and fix it. It works for a day and goes back to older TDS value. Now they are saying we need to replace the Membrane.

comments.title: Worst purchase ever - Don't waste your money
comments.description: writing this review after 11 months of use. This is the worst purchase I have made on Amazon. During installation, the technician will not wait to check the water quality. He will also force you to provide 5 star rating in front of him and when asked for the reason, he will tell you that this is company policy. When complained about this, the company representative will say that there is no such policy but no action will be taken and innocent customers will keep providing 5 star rating to this useless product under pressure. The RO broke down within 11 months and when technician visited on complaint, he told the membrane has to be replaced without even opening the RO at all (he must have some great powers that we don't know about). Even under warranty, they will charge full cost of repair to you. At this point, we gave up and will buy RO from another company. Writing this review so other people can save their money. I believe, most the 5 star rating on this product were given under pressure from the technician during installment. Hope this helps.

comments.title: Pathetic post sale services
comments.description: Product is good but problem started when we shifted to a new place after 6 mnths of installation and no one wanted to visit us, as the product was still under warranty. The service guy would keep on calling and telling to change filter because it has completed 6 months costing around ₹3200 (without even checking) and kept on pushing it and telling the service is free but replacement of product will cost. I truly regret buying this product after such pathetic service.!!!! Just looting people bacuse we bought ro from them!!!! Shame!!!!
